# GKGameSessionErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

The error domain for game sessions.

## Declaration

```swift
let GKGameSessionErrorDomain: String
```

## Deprecated constants

- **GKSessionErrorDomain**: An error occurred in [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession].
- **GKVoiceChatServiceErrorDomain**: An error occurred in [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKVoiceChatService].
